dialogues.text: Holy shit! Anton's the killer! McMACY (standing) We better call for back-up.  59

dialogues.speaker: RUCK
dialogues.text: (pulling McMacy back down) Hold on a sec. If we bring him in ourselves, we'll be heros. McMACY Yeah! But can we do that? I mean, we can't break in there without a warrant.

dialogues.speaker: RUCK
dialogues.text: Piss on the Bill of Rights! We've got just cause! There are three dead kids in there, one of ‘em missing a head. Nobody's gonna fault us for bringing that sicko to justice.

dialogues.speaker: MCMACY
dialogues.text: Okay, let's do it.

dialogues.speaker: RUCK
dialogues.text: One more thing. That's kid is obviously a Grade-A psychc. Don't feel compelled to bring him in alive. McMACY I never do. The cops draw their guns and creep toward the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four kids sit glassy-eyed on the couch, staring throu haze of pot smoke at the TV as . . . Ruck and McMacy kick door in, guns pointed at Anton's head.

dialogues.speaker: RUCK
dialogues.text: Freeze! Anton jumps up. The other three don't even twitch. Anton looks at the cops and then glances wildly around the room a trapped panic.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Guys! What's should I do?

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: (turning) I think-- McMACY (shooting Pnub in the head) Aaahhhh!  60

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: (rubbing his new bullet wound) I was gonna say I think you should do what the officers tell you, but I changed my mind.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Really, man. Just kill ‘en. McMACY (bewildered) They're alive!

dialogues.speaker: RUCK
dialogues.text: They are not. You just shot one in the head. And that one's head isn't even attached. They're obviously zombies or something. :

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (to the boys) Look, I don't want to kill anybody. Well, anybody else, at least.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: You don't want to go to jail, though.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Jail! That's it! I'll give myself up and they'll put me in a rubber room where I can't hurt anyone! (to the cops) Here, cuff me. Anton holds his hands out in front of him, continuing to knit. Ruck holsters his gun and pulls out his handcuffs. McMacy keeps his gun trained on Anton.

dialogues.speaker: RUCK
dialogues.text: Okay, now drop the knitting needles.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Believe me, that's not a good idea. Just cuff me already. But as Ruck reaches out to slap the cuffs on, Anton SPEAR Ruck's hand with one knitting needle and THRUSTS the othe needle through the underside of Ruck's jaw, up into his brain. Lightening-quick, Anton spins Ruck's body around, using i a shield, as McMacy FIRES his first shot.  61 As bullets spray the dead cop's chest, Anton pulls Ruck's from its holster and SHOOTS McMacy right between the eyes Mick, Pnub, and Jimmy applaud. Anton drops Ruck's body

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (distressed) Stop that! It wasn't me! I had no control over my hands. The fucking knitting didn't help at all.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: See? I told you that saying was metaphorical.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Oh, shitit!! He points the gun at the cop corpses in a panic. The dead boys look at him, puzzled.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Ruck and McMacy are gonna try to avenge their deaths now! Stand back!

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Their asses went straight to Hell, Anton. Heaven frowns on dirty cops.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Didn't you see those little black demons whisk their souls away? Anton shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: (to Pnub and Jimmy) Maybe you gotta be dead to see that. As Pnub and Jimmy agree, Anton throws the gun down and st at his hands, distraught.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: What the fuck am I going to do? Satan obviously isn't going to let me turn myself in. (a beat, then--) I know! He marches into the kitchen. The guys haul themselves off the couch and follow him.  62

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton grabs the still-bloody knife and pulls out the cutt board. He lays his right hand on the cutting board and RAISES THE KNIFE with his left.

dialogues.speaker: . MICK
dialogues.text: Oh, no way!

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: It's the only thing I can think of.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: I can't watch! Jimmy turns his head to face his own gaping chest. Anton grits his teeth, raises the knife high in the air, SWINGS it down. The knife STOPS in mid-air, less than an inch above his right wrist.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: (relieved) I knew you wouldn't do it.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (struggling to push the knife down) It's not me. Satan's trying to stop me. Anton shuts his eyes and concentrates, trying with all hi might to force the knife down, but it WON'T BUDGE. Finally, he jumps into the air, using the entire weight o his body to press down on the back of the knife, forcing THROUGH HIS WRIST and bringing it to a satisfying THWACK against the cutting board. Anton SCREAMS like a man who just cut his own hand off. H lifts his right arm... Not only is blood spewing out fast and thick, but his han still PARTIALLY ATTACHED to his wrist. It DANGLES by a thread.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Oh, sick. Anton, grimacing in incredible agony, grabs his right han and JERKS IT OFF. He SCREAMS even louder this time. He grips his bloody stu and falls to the floor in pain.  63

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: That looks bad. You should really put something on it. Mick grabs a small kitchen towel, wraps it around Anton's stump, and secures it with a rubberband.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: That'll stop the bleeding, but how the hell are you planning to cut off your other hand?? Anton frowns. Holding the knife in his left hand, he make few backwards slashing attempts, but doesn't even come -c to reaching his left wrist. He tries to position the knife above his wrist with his r arm, but he can't push it through. He turns to the guys.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Mick, be a bud and cut off my hand?

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: (shaking his head) Too gross.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Pnub? Pnub shakes his head too.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: C'mon, Jimmy. Please? Jimmy's head dry-heaves.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Fine. Fuck you guys then. Leaning over, Anton lays his left hand on the floor, nudg the knife up onto his wrist, and tries to push it through with his FOOT -- but the blade just keeps falling sideway He doggedly goes back to the cutting board. He grips the knife in his TEETH and bobs his head up and down over his arm, but can only make pathetic little scratches.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: (gently) I really don't think self-mutilation's the answer here, Anton. I mean, you're dealing with Satan -- no matter what you do, he'll find a way to fuck with you.  64 Anton suddenly spits the knife out and clutches his towel wrapped stump, wincing hard.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (in agony) The pain's really starting to kick in. He holds his arm tight against his chest, sqeeezing his e shut and breathing hard as .. .- the tip of a shiny, double-edged BLADE pokes through the bloody towel, EXTENDING from Anton's wrist. Anton SCREAMS but he doesn't see the blade growing wickedly upward, hea for the soft underside of his chin. The guys GASP.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Anton, look out! Anton's eyes spring open as Mick grabs his arm, pulling t blade's tip away. As Anton stares in horror, the knife continues to GROW straight out of his stump. When it reac a foot long, it stops and glints evilly.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Jesus.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: I knew you couldn't outsmart Satan.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: At least you can cut your other hand off now. They all look at Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: If you still want to, I mean.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Look at that fucking thing. It's gonna get infected for sure.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Anton, you got any antiseptic?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (in shock) I don't know.  65

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Don't worry, I've got a first-aid kit at my house. We'll just hop over and grab it.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: You wait here, Anton. Try not to move, or you'll lose more blood. We'll be right back to fix you up.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (dazed) Okay. The guys take off and Anton is left alone in the kitchen. starts to bury his face in his hands, but thinks the bett of it and buries his face in just his left hand. On the floor below the cutting board, Anton's DISMEMBERED HAND lies in a pool of blood. Suddenly, a FINGER TWITCHES Anton's face is still hidden as his right hand starts INC slowly toward him... Undetected, the hand crawls up his pantleg and onto his shirt, but when the hand brushes against the bare skin at base of Anton's neck, Anton looks down. Before Anton can react, the hand has him by the throat. H falls back against the floor, struggling for breath and pulling at the hand with his left hand. He can't budge the hand. It SQUEEZES TIGHTER. Anton's fac goes pale as he tries to wheeze. The hand's knuckles turn white, squeezing hard. Anton works his blade-appendage between the hand and his throat. Cutting his neck badly in the process, Anton mana to pry the hand loose. With one hard jerk, he sends the hand flying. It smacks against the fridge and falls to the floor, MOTIONLESS. From out of nowhere, CHILLINGLY SINISTER LAUGHTER erupts. As Anton glances around the room in a panic, searching fo the source of the laughter, the hand SPRINGS back up and flies at him as a FIST. It PUNCHES Anton in the jaw. He reels back, punch-drunk, too dazed to resist as the ha grabs Anton's left wrist and sets it on the cutting board The evil hand seizes the knife Anton used earlier and RAI IT above Anton's left wrist as...  66 the DOORBELL RINGS. Anton snaps.out of his daze and pulls his left arm away j as the evil hand THWACKS the knife against the cutting bo The doorbell rings again.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY, (OS)
dialogues.text: (calling) Anton?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Shit! He goes to look at his watch, but it's still wrapped arou the severed wrist -- FLYING through the air, knife pointe Anton's face. Anton blocks. it with his own blade. As they SWORDFIGHT .

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY, (0S)
dialogues.text: Anton! Are you home?

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM NOWHERE
dialogues.text: (sinister whisper) Molly, isn't it, Anton? Anton's eyes widen in fear.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Don't hurt her! I'11l do whatever you want, just don't hurt her!

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM NOWHERE
dialogues.text: (sinister whisper) I'm not going to hurt. her. Anton looks sick. He eyes his severed hand with new dread The doorbell RINGS again.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (yelling) Molly, get the fuck out of here, you bitch! The evil hand pushes its knife hard against Anton's blade backing Anton up against the counter. Beyond it, Anton ca see DOWN THE HALL into the entry way -- Molly's pressing face against the frosted glass, trying to look inside.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: Anton, quit being cute and let me in!  67 Anton struggles to shove the hand's knife back, but the h is stronger. It forces Anton's own double-edged blade to press against his face. It BREAKS THE SKIN on his cheek a blood trickles down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly's dressed in a nun's habit. A wooden cross sticks straight out from her chest and blood glistens around the fake wound.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: Dammit, Anton, we're late! I'm coming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The knife presses deeper into his face.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: No! Stay out, Molly, I mean it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly tries the doorknob. The door swings open easily, having been kicked in earlier by the cops. She steps insi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly steps over the two cop corpses with a puzzled look. STRANGE SOUNDS ‘can be heard from the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton reaches to the side with his good hand and pulls a out of the sink. He gives the evil hand a good WHACK, knocking the knife from its grasp. While the hand is momentarily stunned, Anton grabs it and SHOVES it into a ceramic Cookie Monster COOKIE JAR. Holding the cookie jar shut between his chest and right a he pulls rubberbands from a drawer and fastens the cookie lid on tight. He sets the cookie jar back on the counter just as Molly enters. She takes in the bloody cutting board, bloody kni bloody floor, and bloody Anton with a ANNOYED SIGH.

dialogues.speaker: . WB.
dialogues.text: Look, you should've called. You needed more time to do your costume, fine, but I hate waiting. Let's.go already.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Molly, I'm the killer. : MOLLY . Uh-huh. Not real original, you know. Half the kids at the dance'll be dressed as the killer. That knife hand's kinda ¢ool, though. She reaches out to ‘touch it. Anton backs. away from her.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I'm not kidding. You've got to get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: What's up with those dead cops in your living room? They look pretty real. Are they part of your costume?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Molly, listen to me! I-- He stops in surprise as his blade arm turns horizontally front of him and RAISES itself into the air. As Anton sta at it, stunned, the blade PULLS him toward Molly. He pulls back with his good hand, but it's no use. His fe slide across the floor as he struggles to stop himself.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (coming at her uncontrollably) Molly, run!

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: Save it for the costume judges. Can we go now? As his blade reaches her throat, Anton shoves Molly back his good hand, trying to keep her out of cutting range. U against the back door, she rolls her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (unenthused) Fine. Help, help. The killer's got me.  69 But the blade closes in on her despite Anton's efforts. I presses against her throat.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: Anton, quit it! That hurts!

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (struggling) I'm trying! I can't help it! She tries to push him off her, but can't. He tries to hol the blade back, but can't.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Molly. There's nothing else I can do. He leans in, kisses her, and PRESSES HIS OWN THROAT AGAIN THE BLADE.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: At least Satan won't win. In one swift movement, he jerks his head sideways, SLITTI his own THROAT. Everything goes BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debi pours Hot Train a dish of birdseed. The parrot hops wordlessly onto the edge of the dish and eats, flinging s and shells everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: (disgruntled) Not even a thank you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debi steps out. The motor home is parked beneath the neon coffee-cup shaped sign of THE HOTCAKE HOUSE. Debi slams t Winnebago door.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Dumb bird. She stalks into the diner as a blue Chevy Nova -- carryin Devon, Joe, and Curtis -- cruises into the lot, blasting Motley Crue's "Shout At the Devil."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON Anton's slit throat as the gash miraculously sea itself shut. It doesn't look pretty, but it's obviously doing the job because Anton sits up, dazed. ANTON'S POV: Everything's blurry. He can hear:

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (shrieking in terror) Anton! Anton, help! But he can't see her. He shakes his head and focuses on jagged pieces. As his vision sharpens, the pieces become broken cookie jar. shards on the floor. Anton turns immediately to see his disembodied hand CHOKI Molly against the back door. Her screams fade; she BLACKS OUT and COLLAPSES onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM NOWHERE
dialogues.text: (sinister whisper) I'll always win, Anton. The spine-chilling laughter fills the room again as Anton hurls himself toward the unconscious Molly. He lifts his blade to SPEAR the hand, but stops abruptly. On second thought, he uses his good hand to bend back the evil hands fingers one by one. He pries the hand loose an it turns on him, bitch-slapping Anton across the face. Anton stumbles back. The hand flies at him again, but thi time, Anton puts his knife-hand up to block it -- and the hand IMPALES ITSELF on Anton's blade. Anton opens the MICROWAVE, flings the hand in, shuts the door, and turns it on HIGH. The evil hand's skin bubbles and then bursts against the microwave door in.a mess of seared flesh and blood.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Gross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devon, Joe, and Curtis lift their overloaded food trays f the buffet line and look around the crowded Hotcake House Every table is occupied.  71 Debi is sitting alone in a booth, barely picking at a piz sized pancake. Devon gives her his best puppy-dog eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Excuse me, ma'am? Do you mind if my friends and I share this booth with you?

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: (not looking up) Hal : Devon, Curtis, and Joe look at each other and shrug. They slide into Debi's booth and begin devouring their food, talking with their mouths full.

dialogues.speaker: CURTIS
dialogues.text: (to Debi) Hey, you got the pizza-sized pancake too. Debi doesn't look up.

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Do you live around here?

dialogues.speaker: CURTIS
dialogues.text: No, I live over --

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Not you, dick, her.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: (looking up) You want to know where I live? Devon nods and then adds:

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Not like we're loony or anything. We won't stalk you.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: I have no home. I don't get to have a home.

dialogues.speaker: JOE
dialogues.text: You need a place to crash?

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Let me ask you something. How did you guys spend your day today?  72

dialogues.speaker: JOE
dialogues.text: Hungover.

dialogues.speaker: CURTIS
dialogues.text: And Dev. spent hours laying on his back in the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: (nodding) New shocks.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: I've never had a driveway. I've never even had a hangover. The guys. look at her with pity.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: You know how I spend my days? I drive around the country looking for the Devil.

dialogues.speaker: CURTIS
dialogues.text: What are you, some kind of freak? You've really never been hungover? Devon kicks Curtis under the table, but Debi ignores them

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: That's right, Satan himself. Oh, I know what you're thinking. Why would a clever, yet attractive, young woman waste her life away searching for Satan? Because I have to. It's my freaking destiny. Devon, Curtis, and Joe have no response to that.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: That's right. I'm not a religious zealot or a cultist. Evil doesn't even bother me all that much. I just have absolutely no say in my own life. And here's the kicker. (they stare blankly at her) I actually have the one thing that can rid this world of Satan forever -- on an ancient scroll passed down through generations of LeCure women -- a holy incantation that will banish the Prince of Darkness to hell. Devon, Curtis, and Joe shovel food into their mouths.  The guys shrug.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: I know what you're thinking. Of course there's a catch. In order to send the Devil packing, I have to read the incantation to his face.

dialogues.speaker: JOE
dialogues.text: (pointing at her pancake) You gonna eat that?

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Help yourself. But reading it to his face is virtually impossible, you under- stand. Satan almost never appears on earth himself. He uses humans —- the weak-minded and slothful -- to do his dirty work. DEVON . (to be polite) Why is that, anyway? Why doesn't he do it himself?

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Are you kidding? Do you have any idea how hot it is in Hell?

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Even the hottest places in the world must be thousands of degrees below what Satan's used to. The Devil can't hack the cold long enough to do much evil himself.

dialogues.speaker: JOE
dialogues.text: (skeptical) He gets too cold??

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Duh, Joe. Why do you think there's no crime in Antarctica? (to Debi) So. How does one go about tracking Satan?

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: I'll tell you. She waits for them to egg her on. They don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I read the papers and watch the news. When I hear about a deranged serial killer on the loose, odds are Satan's involved. I head to that town in hopes of finding the Devil before he moves on to the next schmuck.

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Weird. Satan's like the topic of the day or something. Earlier today, Anton told me Satan was possessing him. Eyes wide, Debi ‘reaches across the table and grabs Devon his Black Sabbath concert T-shirt.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Don't screw with me, mister. Devon pulls his shirt from Debi's grip.

dialogues.speaker: DEVON
dialogues.text: Ease up there, kitten. I'm telling you the truth. He was pretty freaked.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Tell me where he lives. Now!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton's checking Molly's pulse -- he finds it.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Thank God!

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM NOWHERE
dialogues.text: (sinister whisper) He had nothing to do with it. Anton turns, looking around wildly for the source of the voice, but again he finds no one. He puts his good hand protectively on Molly.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (to the room in general) What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM NOWHERE
dialogues.text: (sinister whisper) Kill her.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: No! 74  He turns back to Molly in a panic. 7 5,

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Molly! Molly, wake up! You have to get out of here. Molly! He slaps her face gently with his good hand. She doesn't stir. . As Anton slaps her harder, desperately, his knife-hand RI at his side. Unnoticed, it positions itself above Anton's head, its vicious point AIMED at Molly's forehead. Anton turns from Molly in despair -- and sees his reflect on the oven door: the blade PLUNGES toward Molly. Anton CATCHES THE BLADE in his good hand, just inches fro her face. Blood trickles from his fist, around the sharp metal and down his wrist, as he jerks himself away. He kicks the back door OPEN and runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debi scrambles into the driver's seat clutching a hand-dr MAP on a napkin.

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Hang on, Hot Train. We hit the jackpot! She peels out. On the other side of the restaurant window Devon, Curtis, and Joe shake their heads and continue eat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton's good hand is trashed -- the palm is deeply sliced Ignoring that, he grasps the blade again and PULLS with a vengeance, trying to yank the blade from his stump . . . luck. He peeks under the dishtowel -- his stump has FUSED SHUT around the base of the knife -- it's now part of his body The wound is compltely closed and the blood is gone, but hideous-looking. Anton jerks the dishtowel back into plac

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (yelling, enraged) I will not do this anymore! I'm going back inside and calling an ambulance for Molly..  76 He glances around the dark back yard defiantly, waiting f response. Getting none, he adds:

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Ya fuck. As he stalks back toward the house, a sudden wind comes u rustling the leaves on the ground and CHILLING Anton to t bone. He stops short.

dialogues.speaker: SINISTER WHISPER BEHIND HIM
dialogues.text: Oh, Anton. . . Anton slowly turns -- to find no one. He turns back towar the door and. finds himself face-to-chest with THE DEVIL. Anton jumps. Satan looms over him, 8 feet high with horns tail, and forked tongue, a deep blood-red. on closer inspection, his body is a sea of constantly moving blood, with small wormlike creatures swimming in it.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (terrified) Holy shit!!!

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: You're going back in there alright -- to kill her. (moving slowly in on Anton) See, the way it works is, you're my bitch. You live to pleasure me. Anton inches away, unable to run, eyes wide with fright.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: And tonight's a big night for you. If you can't get it together to kill one dumb chick, how are you going to slaughter several hundred of your peers?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (barely squeaking it out) Why me?

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: You, Anton, are the result of a millennium of carefully planned DNA experimentation. You're the supreme sinner, built to butcher.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (stunned) Really?  77

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: Don't be stupid. You're just a random choice. Now listen, you have the perfect set-up tonight.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (whimpering) You don't need me. You could do it yourself. Please, just let me have my life back. Satan grabs Anton by the collar and LIFTS HIM OFF THE GRO He's face-to-face with the Devil and scared out of his mi

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: Get this through your head, boy. You have no life to get back. You're a murderer. You killed your parents and your friends. You have have a knife for a hand, and you're right-handed. (laughing) You think you can have a normal life? Your only path lies with me now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Winnebago takes a corner at top speed. The large vehicle leans precariously, racing on two wheel for an instant before righting itself with a thud. Debi doesn't slow down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly comes to and gets up, looking extremely confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mick, Pnub, and Jimmy head down the sidewalk toward Anton house carrying a first-aid kit, some frozen burritos, and Jimmy's head, respectively. They see Molly step out of Anton's house, rubbing her temples. She crosses the street toward her own house.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Think they did it?

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Or he tried to kill her.  78 EXT. BACK YARD —— SAME Anton looks down, cringing, as Satan continues to hold hi off the ground and rant. Little flecks of Satan-spittle f into Anton's face.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: I turned you into a killer piece by piece, Anton. You belong to me. Now get in there and kill that girl. Anton musters his courage. He takes a deep breath, and th another, and then:

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (timid but determined) I can't. I love her. Satan throws Anton to the ground in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: You would never even have spoken to her if it wasn't for me. I got you laid. I made you kiss her. You think a ballsy move like that came from your own will?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (in disbelief) You wouldn't do anything good for me.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: Anton, I'm the Devil. I'm into lust. I take time out for a good fuck-show whenever I can.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (aghast) You watched??? Satan grins evilly and SHIVERS in the cold wind blowing across the yard.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (getting to his feet) You know what? Fuck you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debi checks the map, catches sight of a street sign, and suddenly yanks the wheel. They fly into an intersection, against a red light. Traffic on all sides screeches to a halt. Debi keeps going.  79 Hot Train flaps his wings furiously, trying to maintain h balance amid the chaos of the cab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dead boys arrive to find Anton gone.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: He must be in the pisser. Fire those up, Pnub. I'm starved! Pnub opens the microwave door and the HAND-- now nothing a skeleton with a few chunks of cooked flesh clinging to bones -- FLIES OUT at him. The hand zooms past Pnub's head, crashes through a window and DISAPPEARS into the night. The boys look at each other. They don't know what to say. Mick shrugs. Jimmy holds his head up to look at the blood and guts in microwave.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: Maybe we should clean it first,

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Yeah, and while we're at it, we'll just clean the whole fucking house. This isn't our mess. He rips a paper towel from a roll and places it in the microwave. He sets the frozen burritos in on top of it an turns the microwave on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arms crossed over his chest, bored out of his mind, Satan taps his fingers on one arm as the WIND PICKS UP.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (fuming) + + « and, you big, red fuck, you're right, I don't have much of a life anymore. But I'll be damned if I'm gonna spend the rest of it killing people so you can get off.  80

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: (shivering in the cold wind) You're already damned.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (throwing his hands up) So what? Hell can't be worse than this. (realizing something) And I've been resisting you. If you were so all-powerful, I would've killed Molly already. That's why you showed up, isn't it? Satan's eyes blaze with'’rage. He tries to uncross his ar but his JOINTS have STIFFENED in the cold. Anton looks puzzled as Satan grimaces and forces one stif finger to POINT at the ground. A RING OF FIRE springs up around the Devil. He moves his arms and shoulders slowly as his JOINTS WARM and loosen u Suddenly, a strong wind blows the fire out.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: (annoyed, shivering again) Look, I don't have time for this. You don't want to be the predator? Fine. Let's see how you like being one of the prey. Anton suddenly SCREAMS and clutches his knife-hand ... At the base of the knife, BLOOD seeps through the dishtow wrapped around his stump. Anton HOWLS in intense PAIN. Satan's freezing, his TEETH CHATTERING in the cold, but h can't leave before basking in Anton's agony.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: You're no longer under my protection, Anton. How does it feel?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (gritting his teeth) It's worth it.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: (laughing) You think you've stopped me? My plans don't revolve around some piddly human. Enjoy the massacre! Satan vanishes. Anton books for the back door.  81

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His stump DRIPS BLOOD across the kitchen floor as Anton rushes in to find Molly gone.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (yelling, panicked) Molly?? He hears voices in the living room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton hurries in to find Mick, Pnub, and Jimmy kicking it the couch, watching TV.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Guys! Where's Molly??

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: She left. So did you guys do it? Anton rushes to the door, frantic.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (barely paying attention) No. Well, yes, but not today-- He's interrupted by the DING of the microwave. He stops w his hand on the doorknob, eyes wide, turning toward the kitchen in horror.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Hey, since you're up, would you grab those burritos out of the microwave?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Don't tell me you let my hand out                         The guys look at each other, slightly embarrassed. Mick lights the bong.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: We brought you a first-aid kit.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Where's my hand??

dialogues.speaker: PNUB /
dialogues.text: It broke a window and bolted. There wasn't anything we could do.  82

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Shit. Look, I have to find Molly. Now that I'm not the killer anymore, I--

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: You're not?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Satan let me off the hook.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Well, alright then. (offering Anton the bong) Take a hit and relax.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I can't. I mean, I really should check on Molly. Plus, Satan plans on offing a whole shitload of people tonight, and my hand is out there doing who knows what. Don't you think I should do something?

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: What for? It's not your problem any- more. Let the cops handle it. Anton looks down at the two dead cops at his feet.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Still, I feel kinda responsible.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: No one's blaming you, Anton. Come on, take a hit. Maybe we'll head Over to the dance later.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (gasping) The dance! That's where Satan wanted me to go! He's.gonna kill everyone at the dance tonight!

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Calm down, Anton. There's nothing you can do. I say just kick back and forget about it.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: No. Not this time.’ I've spent my whole life--

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Okay, okay. No speeches. Just go.  83

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Right. He grabs a set of keys off the desk and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Maybe we should go to the dance now. You know, before Satan kills everyone.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY'S HEAD
dialogues.text: Yeah. I bet you I win Best Costume. Mick and Pnub narrow their eyes at Jimmy's gaping chest w and severed head.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: You can't go like that, Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: We'll touch you up a bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debi's motor home zips past the park, turning onto Anton' street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton plops down into the seat of his Dad's sportscar. He looks from the STICKSHIFT to his bloody blade hand. It's gonna work.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Fuck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton races into the front yard and glances around. Throu the chain-link fence, he sees DEVON'S TRUCK parked in the driveway next door. Just beyond him, Debbie's Winnebago is hauling ass toward house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Debi roars into Anton's DRIVEWAY, she sees Anton hoppi the fence. She quickly flips her napkin-map over to revea crude sketch of Anton's head.  84

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: We've got him, Hot Train! Look out, Satan, we're right on your ass! She scrambles from the cab to her living room and dives u the kitchen table, spinning the safe's combination locks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devon's truck is unlocked. Anton yanks the door open and jumps in. With Hot Train perched on her shoulder, Debi hurls hersel out of the Winnebago. The ANCIENT SCROLL GLOWS in her han as she races. around the fence toward him.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: No keys. Anton shoves the tip of his knife blade into the truck's ignition and gives it a quick twist. But... The base of the blade ROTATES IN HIS STUMP instead of in ignition. Anton YELPS and rips off the dishtowel -- now soaked through with blood. No longer fused shut, his stump is the gory open wound it should be -- but with a knife shoved into it. He wiggles the knife -- it's slightly LOOSE. Holding it firmly with his good hand, Anton WINCES as he forces the kinife-tip to turn in the ignition.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE DRIVEWAY
dialogues.text: Just as Debi rushes up the drive, yelling --

dialogues.speaker: DEBI
dialogues.text: Anton? Anton, wait! -- the truck ROARS to life.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Twisted Sister's "We're Not Gonna Take It" immediately blasts from the tape deck, obliterating the sound of Debi yelling. Anton throws the truck into reverse.  85

dialogues.speaker: IN THE DRIVEWAY
dialogues.text: BAM! The back of the truck SLAMS FULL-FORCE INTO DEBI. The SCROLL GOES FLYING and Hot Train flaps his wings like crazy as Debi's shoulder drops out from under him. Debi lands at the edge of the driveway.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Braking, Anton looks startled and confused. He checks his rearview mirror. Seeing nothing, he shrugs and continues backing out.

dialogues.speaker: BAM
dialogues.text: One of the back tires goes up and over something. BAM! The front tire follows suit. Anton shakes his head and whips the truck onto the street snapping off the cheesy ‘80s metal.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Damn, Dev, your new shocks suck! Devon's creeper rolls in the truck's bed as Anton roars a

dialogues.speaker: IN THE YARD
dialogues.text: A few feet from Debi's lifeless form, the scroll is glowi softly, lodged in a flower bed. Using his beak, Hot Train PULLS the SCROLL FREE.

dialogues.speaker: DOWN THE BLOCK
dialogues.text: Just a few houses away, ANTON screeches to a STOP in fron Molly's house.

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE STREET
dialogues.text: A LITTLE BOY lovingly wraps his arms around Danzig's neck looks pleadingly up at his MOTHER. She nods and smiles, and the boy's face bursts into a hug grin as they lead Danzig into his new home. Danzig bounds happily.  86

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mick PLUNGES a FORK, pronged-side up, into the top of Jim pulpy neck. He takes Jimmy's head off the counter and SLA it down onto the fork, bringing head and neck together ag Pnub pokes Jimmy's forehead. The head wobbles slightly.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Still a little loose. Mick finds a roll of duct tape in a drawer and wraps it around Jimmy's neck, TAPING his head on tight.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Lift your arms. Jimmy holds his arms away from his chest. His heart falls out, dangling by an entrail. Pnub shoves Jimmy's innards back in as Mick DUCT TAPES him shut.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: How do I look?

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: You'll probably still win Best Costume. Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guys head out of Anton's house. Hot Train hops across the yard toward them, with the ANCIENT SCROLL clutched sa in his beak. Mick's eyes light up. He points excitedly at the Winnebag in the driveway, motor still running.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: No way! How convenient. They walk right past Hot Train and the scroll, and open t Winnebago doors. Hot Train flies up into a tree, and TEARS THE SCROLL TO SHREDS, lining his new nest with glowing bits.

dialogues.speaker: HOT TRAIN
dialogues.text: (singing) It's like raaaaiiin on your wedding day, it's a free ride, when you've already paid...  87

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton rings the doorbell repeatedly. Molly's FATHER opens the door.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY'S DAD
dialogues.text: There's no trick-or-treating this year, son.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I know. Is Molly here?

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY'S DAD
dialogues.text: Are you the little bastard who stood up my daughter?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: No, sir. I'm just a little late.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY'S DAD
dialogues.text: That costume of yours is in very sick taste. Do you think these murders are some kind of joke? The Winnebago, with Mick at the wheel, cruises past behin Anton.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: No, sir, I don't. Look, I really have to see Molly.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY'S DAD
dialogues.text: She got sick of waiting for you and went to the dance alone, and I must say I think she made a wise choice. But Anton's already racing toward the curb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Mick drives and Jimmy fiddles with the radio from the passenger seat, Pnub explores the living area. He looks over the murder-oriented news clippings above th refrigerator and then opens the fridge. His eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Beer!  88

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lame Halloween decorations deck the walls. Costumed TEENAGERS mill about as a BAND PLAYS an horrible, pointle cover of Kenny Loggins' "Danger zone" on the stage and a adult CHAPERONES lean against the walls. Molly enters in her nun's outfit and her friend, TANYA, j her at the punch table.

dialogues.speaker: TANYA
dialogues.text: Hey, Moll. Nice costume. (touching the BLOODY CROSS Plunged into Molly's chest) What are you, a vampire?

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (still foggy) No.

dialogues.speaker: TANYA
dialogues.text: So I thought you were bringing your new guy.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: He never showed, the fuck. I fell asleep waiting for him and now I feel all gross and groggy.

dialogues.speaker: TANYA
dialogues.text: Ouch. Stood up. Mick, Pnub, and Jimmy saunter up, doing their best to hid few beers in. their pockets.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Hey, girls.

dialogues.speaker: TANYA
dialogues.text: Wow, you guys look great! Who did your make-up?

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: My friend, Anton. Mick raises his eyebrows suggestively at Molly. She glare Tanya rubs her fingers along Mick's forehead wound.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Careful. There might still be some glass in there.  89

dialogues.speaker: TANYA
dialogues.text: Cool.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: Another part of the gym. A bored adult CHAPERONE stands guard at a doorway. He hears a NOISE and looks behind him peering into the dark hallway. A lightening-fast skeletal HAND JABS him through the eyes boring into his brain. The chaperone's SCREAM is drowned by the BAND's deafening song-ending climax.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: This band sucks.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: An UNSEEN FORCE drags the dead chaperone into the dark hallway.

dialogues.speaker: BACK AT THE PUNCH TABLE
dialogues.text: Jimmy turns from the band to see Tanya deeply french-kiss Mick's decomposing mouth.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Oh, that's disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: It's fucking illegal. Pnub pries Mick away from Tanya.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: C'mon, man, you're dead. Think about it. It's gross. Mick shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (sighing) I'm going for a walk. As she disappears through the door left unguarded by the dead chaperone...  90 Anton bursts into the gym, his stump bloodier than ever a mushy with DECOMPOSING FLESH around the knife.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (yelling) Stop the dance! The band crashes to a halt and all eyes turn to Anton.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I'm the killer! A sea of Jasons, Freddies, Mansons, and Nightstalkers sta at him for just a second before going back to their conversations. The band resumes playing. Anton runs on-stage, grabbing the microphone from the sin The band stops again.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (into the mic) I'm not fucking around!

dialogues.speaker: CHAPERONE
dialogues.text: Hey, watch your language.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I'm not messing around. You're all in danger here. Go home! The devil's coming to kill you all! The student body scoffs.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Really! He already made me kill my parents, a couple of cops, and Mick, Pnub, and Jimmy! The crowd turns collectively toward the punch table, wher Jimmy is emptying a BEER into the punchbowl. Anton looks stunned to see them there as the three dead boys wave at crowd.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: It's true!

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (hiding the beer bottle) Yeah, he sliced me up real good. The crowd laughs, dismissively turning away from Anton. Deflated, he hands the mic to the singer and mopes over t the punch table.  91

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Stupid idiots. They're all gonna die and there's nothing I can do about it.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Uh-huh.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: At least they'll get to live it up before they're systematically slaughtered, thanks to me. He slides another beer from his pocket and pops the cap o with the bottle-opener on his keychain. Anton stares at t KEYCHAIN as Jimmy pours the beer into the punch.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: You can't spike punch with beer, dipshit. Like the whole school is gonna get drunk because you added a beer or two to that bowl.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: I'm not done. Jimmy pops another beer open as Anton continues to focus the keychain. Suddenly-—-

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: That's it! I know how to defeat Satan!

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: With beer?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: No. Jimmy, I need to borrow your keys.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (handing them over) Okay.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Great. (heading for the door, turning back) Hey, has anyone seen Molly?

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: She went for a walk.  92

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Shit! Look, could you guys find. her and get her out of here? I don't want anything to happen to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Thanks. I'll be right back. Jangling the keys, Anton bolts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly stops at a water fountain, leaning over to drink, w she hears:

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM NOWHERE
dialogues.text: Molly.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (jerking up) What? Silence. Frowning, she’ wipes water droplets off her mout and looks around. A little ways down the hall, a LIGHT FLICKS ON inside a classroom. The door is slightly ajar. Molly slowly, cautiously approaches the classroom. A sign the door reads "SHOP ROOM." She steps in. The door SLAMS shut behind her.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY, (OS)
dialogues.text: (piercing scream) Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: A large, red slab of MEAT hanging from a hook. Anton push a huge, metal MACHINE through the meat warehouse toward a open door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devon's truck is parked beside the building, below the si WARDEN MEATS. The warehouse door is open and Jimmy's keys dangle from the lock.  93 On the side of the meat-packing plant, a silver, industri garage door slides up and open with a CLANG. The massive machine -- with FREEZE-WHIZ 4000 painted on t side -- is balanced precariously on the little creeper fr Devon's truck. Steadying the Freeze-Whiz and pushing from behind, Anton grunts with effort. As he rolls the machine toward the truck, a sudden wind c up. Anton shivers in the breeze and... HEARS a SCRAPING SOUND. He cocks his head and listens- Nothing. He peers over the top of the Freeze-Whiz. Nothin Then the sound comes again -- SCRAPE . . . SCRAPE... It's coming from behind him. He very, very slowly turns to loo over his shoulder... . and sees nothing. Grimly holding his knife-hand at the ready and keeping a sharp, suspicious look-out, he continues on toward the tr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mick, Pnub, and Jimmy creep cautiously down the dark hall They HEAR SOMETHING.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Did you hear something?

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Yeah. It sounded like flesh being ripped off.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: We better check it out. Mick starts forward, but Pnub and Jimmy hesitate.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Quit being pussies. It's not like we're gonna get killed again. They move covertly down the hall and the FLESHY NOISES ge LOUDER. They round a corner and see FIGURES lurching in t shadows.  94 Jimmy grabs one of the figures and pulls it into the ligh + - . it's a costumed TEENAGED GIRL, and Jimmy's holding her by the boobs.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: Let go, fucker. Before Jimmy can react, the girl's BOYFRIEND steps out of shadows and PUNCHES Jimmy in the face. Jimmy's head FLIES OFF and rolls down the hall. His body just stands there with a fork sticking out of his neck. The girl SCREAMS and runs away. Her boyfriend SCREAMS and runs after her. The guys shrug, Jimmy retrieves his head, and they contin the search down the hallway, past the closed Shop door .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON: Molly's chest as the WOODEN CROSS is yanked out her nun's habit by an unseen hand. We don't see her face; she doesn't resist. CLOSE ON: A whirring, industrial-strength SANDING MACHINE The blunt end of the cross is held to it by the same unse hand and the powerful sander quickly files it into a SHAR POINT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one notices as each set of the gym's double doors, ope the parking lot, CLOSE SILENTLY, seemingly of their own accord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Devon's truck is parked at a reckless angle in the lot. Anton wheels the Freeze-Whiz, on the creeper, up to the closed gymnasium doors. The horrible band can be heard covering "The Eye of the Tiger" as Anton tugs on a door handle. The door won't bud Puzzled, he pushes the machine around a corner of the sch and finds a single door -~ UNLOCKED. Victorious, he wheel the Freeze-Whiz in.  95

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the weird blue light of the deserted swimming pool, An goes to plug the Freeze-wWhiz into a wall outlet, but bef he gets there... A quiet CREAK is barely audible from across the room. Ant whirls around to inspect the room -- a door is OPEN at th far end. Anton frowns at it, hesitating -- was it open when he cam in? But nothing moves. Even the water is still. Shrugging he plugs in the Freeze-Whiz. It powers up with a LOUD ROA

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE ROOM
dialogues.text: The open door slams SHUT, but Anton can't hear it -- or anything else -- over the WHIR of the Freeze-whiz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's in the room with Anton. His back is turned, h fiddling with the Freeze-Whiz's temperature dial, as it APPROACHES him stealthily. Whatever it is, it's practical breathing down Anton's neck when he TURNS . . . Anton JUMPS, startled, and then looks relieved.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Molly! God, I'm glad to see you! Molly's standing in front of him, hands OUT OF SIGHT behi her back. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: I want to apologize for, you know, earlier. Hey, guess what, though? I'm not the killer anymore, so you don't have to worry!

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (still smiling) I'm not worried. .

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Good, ‘cause you've gotta understand that I'm not really like that. I'm a nice guy. As he rambles, we PAN DOWN behind Molly to reveal the SHARPENED CROSS clutched behind her back.  96

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Thanks for being so cool about this. You have no idea what it's like to-- Molly brings the cross up over her head and PLUNGES it to Anton's skull. He scrambles out of the way just in time.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Jesus Christ. I guess you do know what it's like! He backs away as Molly advances.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Molly, you don't know what you're doing. I werit through that stage too. You've got to try and clear your head. Molly stabs at him again, but Anton blocks her cross with blade hand, slightly CUTTING HER HAND in the process.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She clutches her cut hand in pain.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (going to her) I'm sorry. Molly BURIES the cross in Anton's shoulder. He howls as s pulls it out and stabs at him again. This time, he moves before the cross finds its mark.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (backing up against the high dive ladder) Molly, listen to me. I've got a plan to defeat Satan. Your part is easy. All you have to do is not kill me. She's inching toward him, not listening. With his back pressed against the ladder, there's nowhere to go but up. Anton climbs up a step.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl and her boyfriend from the hall stand by the pun bowl, talking to Tanya.  97

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: »- + - and then his head came off! It looked so real.

dialogues.speaker: TANYA
dialogues.text: Have you guys noticed that all the chaperones have disappeared?

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: They probably went to find a better party. This band sucks.

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: Yeah, let's get outta here. Tanya, the girl, and her boyfriend head for the exit, whe CROWD has gathered. They try the doors.

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: (pulling harder) Hey, this is fucking locked!

dialogues.speaker: SOME GUY
dialogues.text: Yeah, man. We just tried to leave too. It's no use.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: There's a door in the pool room that's always open. I think the lock's busted.

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: Cool. Pretty much all of the students head into the dark hallwa The band keeps playing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly and Anton are up on the HIGH DIVE. Molly LUNGES. Anton SLIPS, falling flat on his back. She looms over him brandishing her cross as... the HAND flies into the room with blood dripping from its skeletal fingers. It beelines straight for the Freeze-Whi and SHUTS IT OFF. Anton hears the machine sputter and go quiet. He turns hi head to look and Molly STABS him in the shoulder again. Anton SCREAMS. Mick, Pnub and Jimmy come into the pool room.  98

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: (pointing) There's that hand!

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: (holding his head onto his . neck with both hands) : Hey, that's my Dad's Freeze-Whiz 4000!

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Guys! Guys! The guys look around the room, confused. On the diving board, Molly stabs at Anton's chest. He blocks it with hi blade -- but the impact LOOSENS the knife even more and A winces with pain as the knife's base WOBBLES in his stump He grabs Molly's wrist in his good hand and holds it stil

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Anton?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Up here! They look up at the high dive.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (grappling with Molly) You guys have got to turn that Freeze- Whiz back on! It's the only way to beat Satan. The guys eye the machine. The skeletal hand guards it lik pitbull.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Sure thing, buddy. As the three guys march toward the hand, the horde of costumed students enter the pool room.

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: That's the kid whose head I punched off! The guys close in on the hand and Jimmy lets go of his he to lunge at it. The hand smacks Jimmy's hands away, jostling his head. Jimmy's head flies off his neck and rolls close enough to CATCH THE HAND in his TEETH.  99

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Yeah, fuck it up, Jimmy. Bite it again! But as Jimmy opens up to bite again, the hand CRAWLS INSI HIS MOUTH and OUT the bottom where his throat should be. hand grabs Jimmy's head by the hair and TOSSES it into th pool.

dialogues.speaker: PNUB
dialogues.text: Don't worry, man. I'll get you! Mick, you cover the hand! — Pnub grabs a long pole with a net on the end to fish Jimm head out of the pool as Mick dives at the skeletal hand.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE HIGH DIVE
dialogues.text: Still on his back, Anton holds Molly's cross-jabbing wris with his one good hand as she leans over him.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Molly, I can't defend myself without hurting you! You have to clear your mind. If you resist, Satan'll show up and we can beat him! He brings his pleading face up close to hers. She squirms trying to wrench her wrist from his grasp.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: You can do it, Molly. She snarls evilly at him.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Please. For me. He kisses her softly on the lips. Suddenly, her eyes fill with tears. Anton lets go and watches, holding his breath as . . . Mo convulses, struggling with herself. Her hand, holding the cross, starts to move toward Anton, but Molly flights to it back. Summoning all her strength, she forces her fingers to LET of the cross. It clatters onto the diving board and she collapses on top of Anton.  100

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (hugging her) Yes! I knew you'd come through, Molly! A split-second later, Satan appears on the high dive, blocking their way to the ladder.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: You big, fat, fucking idiot, Anton.

dialogues.speaker: BELOW
dialogues.text: The costumed students stare up at Satan in amazement and fear. Pnub continues trying to fish Jimmy's head out of t pool, but it keeps bobbing away. Mick has his hands full fighting the skeletal hand.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE HIGH DIVE
dialogues.text: Grimacing in pain, Anton uses his good hand to keep the b of his knife pressed into his stump, trying to stop it fr wobbling around as he points it defensively at Satan.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: What's the big plan? You're gonna make me cold?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (nervous but defiant) That's right. He starts to sit up, but Satan plants a massive foot on Anton's chest, forcing him to lie back down.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: Even if your stupid friends manage to turn that thing on, you think I'll be helpless?

dialogues.speaker: BELOW
dialogues.text: The girl tugs on her boyfriend's arn.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: Let's go. The boyfriend nods and they start toward the door. The re of the kids follow.  101

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: You can't imagine the extent of my power. All I.have to do is point my finger, and BAM! Fire! Satan points his finger and BAM! A wall of fire appears a the door, blocking it from the girl and her boyfriend. Th jump back and, in a panic, the whole crowd rushes for the door to the hallway. Laughing, Satan points his finger again, and the hall doo consumed in fire.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: Nobody leaves!

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (holding Molly close) . We've already won. We resisted you. SATAN . Yeah, congrats. Guess what you win, a brand-new fiery death! You two'll burn along with everyone else here tonight. (to the crowd) You can all thank Anton for your early demise. (to Anton) If you hadn't been so much fun to fuck with, I'd've moved on to some other town long ago. Satan laughs as the entire student body glares at Anton.

dialogues.speaker: GUY IN CROWD
dialogues.text: Nice goin' Anton.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL IN CROWD
dialogues.text: Thanks a lot.

dialogues.speaker: ACROSS THE ROOM
dialogues.text: Mick forces the hand to the ground and STEPS ON IT. He gr as he hears each bony finger BREAK. He holds the bent, gnarled thing up with satisfaction and...

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: (turning the Freeze-Whiz on) Anton, your gizmo's back on!  102 The Freeze-Whiz ROARS to life once again. On the high div Anton cranes his neck to see, giving Mick a quick thumbs-

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Yes! (narrowing. his eyes at Satan) Now you're done for. Satan rolls his eyes as the crowd CHEERS. Pnub finally scoops Jimmy's head into the net, but as he turns with it, the end of the pole smacks into the Freeze Whiz, KNOCKING the machine into a corner of the POOL.

dialogues.speaker: SATAN
dialogues.text: (laughing his ass off) That's just perfect! Anton sadly watches the Freeze-Whiz sink to the bottom of pool... - +» . but he also notices something else: the water arou the machine starts to FREEZE!

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: (to Satan) Laugh it up, Fucko! He grabs Satan by the ankles and plants his foot firmly i the Devil's crotch. In one swift movement, he heaves Sata over’ himself and Molly, and OFF THE END OF THE DIVING BO The crowd CHEERS again, but Satan just LAUGHS as he plumm In the pool, ICE is SPREADING rapidly out from the Freeze Whiz, heading toward the middle of the pool. In mid-fall, Satan extends his TONGUE upward, WRAPPING IT around ANTON'S THROAT and YANKING HIM OVER THE EDGE TOO. The crowd GASPS.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (screaming) Anton! Anton falls through the air, just seconds behind Satan. Fach, Up, fatan laughs -- as best he can ae tHe teRgue Stic hag out -- as Anton struggles, tugging tongue aroun his throat. SPLASH! Satan hits the pool. The water instantly FREEZES SOLID OVER HIM.  Avo A split-second later, Anton SLAMS AGAINST THE HARD ICE wi bone-shattering smack. His knife, knocked completely out his stump by the impact, goes spinning across the ice. Anton doesn't move.

dialogues.speaker: MICK
dialogues.text: Oh, shit.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (scrambling down the ladder) Anton! Oh my god, Anton!

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: Is he dead? The crowd stares in silent horror as Mick, Pnub, and Jimm slide across the ice toward their buddy .. . but before they can reach Anton, the. boys' bodies COLLAP Three transparent SOULS RISE from the corpses.

dialogues.speaker: MICK'S SOUL
dialogues.text: (to Pnub) Nice move, dickhead. I think you just avenged our deaths. The three boys' spirits VANISH as Molly rushes franticall across the frozen pool. She frees Anton's throat from Satan's tongue and kisses him. He doesn't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COPS swarm the parking lot, questioning students. The doo to the pool room is roped of with yellow crime scene tape Captain Tidwell surveys the scene, passing a young COP ta notes as the girl and her boyfriend relate last night's events ...

dialogues.speaker: BOYFRIEND
dialogues.text: - - + and Satan just starts laughing. So then my man says “Laugh it up, Fucko" and he grabs Satan by the. . . Captain Tidwell passes Anton's knife, bagged and tagged o nearby table with bits of stump-gore clinging to it. He steps over the yellow tape and into the pool room.  104

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bunch of COPS are hard at work. The Freeze-whiz , now unplugged, still rests at the bottom of the pool, but the water is once again liquid. Satan is nowhere to be seen. A SERGEANT looks up from dusting the Freeze-Whiz's plug f fingerprints.

dialogues.speaker: SERGEANT
dialogues.text: Sir, I can't. find any prints of that skeletal hand everyone keeps talking about. Most of the prints belong to that kid, Anton.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN TIDWELL
dialogues.text: (muttering to himself) Skeletal hand, Satan... (to Sergeant) I want the contents of that punch bowl analyzed for LSD immediately. I have a pretty good idea what happened here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molly and a DOCTOR stand over Anton's bed. Anton's in a f body cast. His eyes are open but unmoving, STARING at a point beyond the Doctor.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: I'm sorry to have to tell you this, Molly, but it doesn't look good. Your boyfriend sustained serious brain damage.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: Can he hear me?

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: Doubtful. And if he could, we'd never know. He's paralyzed from the forehead down

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: (touching Anton's forehead sadly) I can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (putting a consoling arm around her) We're doing all we can.  io The Doctor ushers Molly from the room, revealing the poin where Anton is staring: a TV hanging from the ceiling. ANTON'S POV: F-Troop is on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Doctor leads Molly down the hall. An orderly wheels a cart of surgical tools past them.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: Is there any chance he'll recover?

dialogues.speaker: DOCTOR
dialogues.text: (gently) I wouldn't get my hopes up. Seemingly without her knowledge, Molly's hand reaches out pilfers an EXTREMELY SHARP SCALPEL.from the cart. She hol it behind her back.

dialogues.speaker: MOLLY
dialogues.text: I appreciate you cutting to the truth, Doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NURSE enters the room. She looks at F-Troop on the TV a then back at Anton. She waves a hand in front of Anton's face. He doesn't blink. The Nurse shrugs and SNAPS OFF THE Tv. CLOSE ON Anton's horrified eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fucking figures.
